'''Amir''' is an [[Infectious Disease|ID]] [[Resident|resident]] working at [[Seattle Grace Hospital]].

==History==
When [[Sophie Larson]] was trying to avoid being sent to her nursing home, she convinced George to say he believed she had West Nile Virus. She then used her charm to convince Amir to do a spinal tap to test her for the virus. The test was negative.

==Career==
Amir is a [[Resident|resident physician]] [[Specialties|specializing]] in [[Infectious Disease|infectious disease]]. He works at [[Seattle Grace Hospital]].

==Notes and Trivia==
*Amir is the only [[Infectious Disease|ID]] [[Resident|resident]] shown on-screen.
